english: Hey, Lyu! Did you get the target information?
I think so, give me some time to check.
Wait... Jack again? Is this the third mission on this guy we got this month?
It seems like you need to drop a harder lesson.
We are bounty hunters. They pay, we kill.
You know, this dumb virtual world where you are living is ruleless
It has been a while since the last workout. Let's see if you are rusty.
The floor under your feet seems vulnerable. Break it!
Search around. The key should be nearby.
I found some weird floating orbs in the air. Any idea about what they are?
Weird floating orbs? Are they in blue color?
Those orbs are data interpreters of this virtual world. They should not be seen by a human client. They would give you extra momentum for doing more staff.
You... You... You again?! The goddamn "E-Ghost"!
There will be no third time. In this distance, you are so dead.
Just focus on the mission, Lyu. It was weird and we will figure that out later.
I am sure it was not a illusion. I just can feel a deeper connection with everything.
It is weird. Why do those guards and drones keep chasing me? Jack was already forced to sign out and they are supposed to stop functioning.
Oh, they are still chasing. I'd better hurry.
An emergency exit is located on the top of this building. I did not find any drones or guards nearby.
Go across the dancing bar. The exit should be able to get you safely out of there.
